Prentice-Hall, Englewood Cliffs, NJ, 1991. Second Edition, 1994.<P> V. F. Russo and D. E. Comer. Using ATM for a Campus-Scale Wireless Internet. In Proceedings of the 1994 IEEE Workshop on Mobile Computing Systems and Applications, Santa Cruz, CA, December 1994.
